title: PBE
body: Waited literally overnight to log into PBE cause of queue. I wake up and go to check it and im told the servers are down. When will i be able to actually log in

replies.body: So I did it again over night and it hadn't logged in. Did it again while at work today and it still hasn't allowed me access

Yeah this sucks hard. Me and my mates left the client open over night for PBE, wake up and still told '21 mins, 41 mins or 2 hours' alternating randomly with a q of over 9000. We all went to work and come home and most of clients say the same thing still. One guys client had logged him in and then when he went to start a game it booted him out and now says Q over 9000 again.
